Virginia, was found dead in the Sissonville area.</p><p class="text | article-text">Michael Smith was later arrested, telling deputies he shot and killed Johnson, then dumped her body in a deep water well on his girlfriend’s property.</p><p class="text | article-text">Deputies said their investigation led them to believe it was Smith’s girlfriend, Virginia Smith, who pulled the trigger. </p><p article-text">Michael Smith received the maximum sentences Tuesday.</p><p class="text | article-text">He was sentenced for 40 years in prison for second-degree murder, and he will have a 143-day credit.</p><p class="text | article-text">He was also sentenced to one to five years in prison for concealment of a dead body, and five years in prison for possession of a firearm as a convicted felon.</p><p class="w-100"></p><p class="text | article-text">Michael Smith also was sentenced to life in prison for malicious assault, and two to 10 years in prison for assault in the commission of a
